description:
"I'm really nervous."
And it was obvious. Jeremy was really quiet at first and was only giving one-word answers.
After our guys got him naked and had him do some flexing he starting to laugh and have fun.
And talk about holy shit! This guy is perfect from head to toe: cute face, beautiful skin, muscles, big dick, and floppy balls! So he's not super talkative. When you look like him who the fuck cares?
"So do you have a girlfriend?" we asked.
"Yeah."
"How long have you been together?"
"Four years."
"What does she look like?"
"Short," he said. "A little thick at the bottom. That's the way I like it."
In his words, the one thing she won't let him do: "Go in the, um, ass."
"What if you accidentally put it in?"
"She'd beat my ass."
"So when you and your girlfriend have sex does she admire your body?"
"No," he said. "She just moans."
What the fuck?? You have a perfect ten in your bed and all you want to do is be bitchy or just lay there? I don't know about you, but if he was mine we'd never leave the house!
Girls!
title: Jeremy
